PHRASE.LANG: Doll in the shape of the "Starving Ghost" spirit which is rumoured to roam Edo at night.[#Legal]
Figurine de “gaki”. Ce monstre rôde, paraît-il, dans Edo la nuit.[#Legal]
Puppe des Gaki-Monsters, von welchem vermutet wird, dass es nachts in Edo auftaucht.[#Legal]
Statuetta di un gaki, mostro che, nel periodo Edo, si credeva apparisse durante la notte. [#Legal]
El muñeco de un monstruo Gaki que se dice aparece en las noches de Edo.[#Legal]
夜の江戸に現れるという噂のモノノケ「餓鬼」を象った人形。[#Legal]
에도에서 밤이 되면 나타난다고 하는 소문의 요괴「아귀」를 본따 만든 인형. [#Legal]
Doll in the shape of the "Starving Ghost" spirit which is rumored to roam Edo at night.[#Legal]
傳聞會在晚上的江戶出現的「餓鬼」妖怪的玩偶。[#Legal]
傳聞會在晚上的江戶出現的「餓鬼」妖怪的玩偶。[#Legal]
Doll in the shape of the "Starving Ghost" spirit which is rumored to roam Edo at night.[#Legal]
